description: This is an easy, low level trail with some interesting views of the Cheakamus River canyon and the rail line that wends its way though tunnels and bridges on the canyon's cliff sides.
directions: Take the Squamish Valley Road turn-off from Highway 99 (left opposite the entrance to Alice Lake Provincial Park).  After a river crossing, turn right onto Paradise Valley Road and drive to its end.
title: Cheakamus Canyon
